name: FinCore
description: Complex financial data visualization was overwhelming for users, leading to poor decision-making and slow workflows.

context.description: FinCore provides real-time financial analytics for SME owners. The previous version was cluttered and hard to read.
context.usage: Desktop web dashboard for in-depth analysis.

problem.statement: Users couldn't quickly identify cash flow trends due to poor data visualization.
problem.core: Time to insight was over 5 minutes per session.

goals.primary: Reduce time to insight to under 30 seconds.

decisions.title: Progressive Disclosure
decisions.desc: Show high-level metrics first, with ability to drill down into details.

decisions.title: Semantic Coloring
decisions.desc: Used distinct color palettes for income vs expenses to reduce cognitive load.

uxFlow.primary: Login -> Dashboard Overview -> Drill down into specific report -> Export PDF.
uxFlow.edge: Empty states for new businesses with no data.

solution.title: Dashboard Overview
solution.caption: Clean, card-based layout showing key health metrics at a glance.

outcome.quote: "Finally, a dashboard that makes sense immediately."

learnings: Data visualization requires testing with real data sets, not just Lorem Ipsum.
Accessibility in charts is challenging but essential.
